title: Breakfast with Frederick
seo_title: Bed and Breakfast | Deals at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: Enjoy daily breakfast for two at Serafina, located in our hotel lobby, as well as our signature amenities
description:
Have an unforgettable night and an even more memorable morning at the Frederick Hotel in Tribeca. Enjoy daily breakfast for two at Serafina, located in our hotel lobby, as well as our signature amenities:

 

  • Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel

  • Frette linens

  • In-room safes

  • Alarm clock

  • Concierge services

  • Valet parking

  • Valet laundry

  • 24-hour fitness room

  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities

  • Pay per view

  • HD Channels

  • Complimentary New York Times newspapers

  • Serafina, Starbucks and Pret A Manger on premises
addon: Book this package and youâ€™ll also receive a $25 American Express Card for each night you stay with us, up to $200.
